Text.Page:
The Kazuur Syndicate borrowed some heavy help from the Red Lash pirates. You're going to make sure they never go home.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:12#13#Red Lash clawriders}. They're tough, so take allies.

Report your success to Taniel at Vindicator Outpost.
Keep up the good work, <PCCLASS:lcase>. For the federation!

The targets are the {@LinkCreature:12#13#Red Lash clawriders}.

I'm sorry, but you're not finished yet.
